numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that young women reach out to their parents more than young men.
2. I wonder if this trend is caused by women who want to continue the relationship with their parents.
3. I wonder if it is uncool for men to reach out to their parents.
4. This trend relates to my community.
5. In my community, I have seen many women come back and spend time with their families.
6. I ask what the reason is that men are less active with their parents.
